description: This Dashboard is for Azure SQL Managed Instances , will also work with SQL on VM's or On-premise SQL Server

targets.query: SELECT LAST("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT LAST("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/  AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT LAST("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT LAST("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/  AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "sku" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  and  sku !='SQL Azure'  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "sql_version" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "hardware_type" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND $timeFilter AND "hardware_type" != 'HYPERVISOR'
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /SQL Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /Resource Pool Stats/ AND  "counter" = 'CPU usage %') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT MEAN("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') OR ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

SELECT MEAN("cpu_count") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag = 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') OR ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'CPU usage %' AND "object" =~ /Workload Group Stats/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval),  "instance" fill(linear)

SELECT "cpu_count" FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag <> 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') OR ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter  fill(previous)

SELECT "cpu_count" FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "hardware_type"::tag = 'HYPERVISOR' AND "sql_version"::tag = '12.0.2000.8') OR ("sql_instance" =~ /$InstanceName$/ AND "sql_version"::tag <> '12.0.2000.8') AND $timeFilter   fill(previous)
SELECT non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceType.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"
SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object" =~ /Memory Manager/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"
SELECT "size_kb" FROM "sqlserver_memory_clerks" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "clerk_type"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Buffer Manager/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Access Methods/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /General Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /Locks/ AND "counter" =~ /Deadlocks/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /General Statistics/ AND "counter" =~ /User Connections/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~ /General Statistics/ AND ("counter" =~ /Active Temp Tables/ OR "counter"=~/Temp Tables For Destruction/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter", time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="sql_instance"
list.label: InstanceName
list.name: InstanceName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="sql_instance"

title: SQL Managed Instance Performance
